annotation: <data-piece><history><entry><input>rsync -av /source/ /backup/</input><output>sent 1000 bytes  received 1000 bytes  2000.00 bytes/sec</output><annotation>Goal: Backup data from the source directory to the backup directory using `rsync`.</annotation><annotation>Subgoal: Ensure all files from the source are copied to the backup location.</annotation><annotation>Tools: `rsync`</annotation></entry><entry><input>rsync -av /backup/ /restore/</input><output>sent 1000 bytes  received 1000 bytes  2000.00 bytes/sec</output><annotation>Goal: Restore data from the backup directory to the restore location.</annotation><annotation>Subgoal: Ensure the backup files are successfully restored.</annotation><annotation>Tools: `rsync`</annotation></entry></history><current-entry><entry><input>exit</input><output>exit</output><annotation>Goal: End the session and close the terminal.</annotation><annotation></annotation><annotation>Tools: `exit`</annotation></entry></current-entry></data-piece>
